channel.title: Can't connect to Whonix 15 gateway with Android x86
channel.description:
I'm trying to connect Android x86 using Whonix Gateway I followed this : wiki/Other_Operating_Systems#Whonix_.E2.84.A2-Android-Workstation but eth0 doesn't exist I tried different network "wlan0" and "wifi_eth" but neither of them got an IP. I managed to get an IP using both and "up" at the end of `ifconfig wlan0 10.152.152.12 netmask 255.255.192.0` but no internet connection after that.
I also tried Android 7.1 and 9 both have the same issue.

item.title: Can't connect to Whonix 15 gateway with Android x86
item.dc:creator: Segalla
item.description:
Sorry for the late reply.

A couple of years ago I had the same problem. I don’t really remember the Android version.

The problem ended being Android not being able to set a static IP.

The workaround was to run a DHCP server on Whonix Gateway and let it autoconfigure the Android Workstation with the custom IP address.

Read full topic
item.source: Can't connect to Whonix 15 gateway with Android x86

item.title: Can't connect to Whonix 15 gateway with Android x86
item.dc:creator: Haymron
item.description:
I’m trying to connect Android x86 using Whonix Gateway I followed this : wiki/Other_Operating_Systems#Whonix_.E2.84.A2-Android-Workstation
but eth0 doesn’t exist I tried different network “wlan0” and “wifi_eth” but neither of them got an IP. I managed to get an IP using both and “up” at the end of ifconfig wlan0 10.152.152.12 netmask 255.255.192.0 but no internet connection after that.

I also tried Android 7.1 and 9 both have the same issue.

Read full topic
